body_html:
What is your os? On a first glance that looks rather fine but you can look at https://github.com/geoHeil/dev-env/blob/master/osx-setup.sh sbatir <notifications@github.com> schrieb am Mi. 29. März 2017 um 18:12:
…
Hey @geoHeil <https://github.com/geoHeil> , could you show me what paths you've got? I'm getting the exact same error as you, but I also have cudnn downloaded and installed. dyn-160-39-142-202:lib sbatir$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcud* lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir admin 33 Mar 3 17:36 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib -rwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 13504 Jan 11 20:31 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 45 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudadevrt.a lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 50 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 46 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 49 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir admin 36 Mar 3 17:37 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5 -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib -rwxr-xr-x@ 1 sbatir admin 76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib -rwxr-xr-x@ 1 sbatir admin 76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.dylib -rw-r--r--@ 1 sbatir admin 64702864 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn_static.a — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#7900 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABnc9PizTPHRid_U8enOzFbkCm7heia3ks5rqoLGgaJpZM4MMbIm> .
body_text:
What is your os? On a first glance that looks rather fine but you can look
at https://github.com/geoHeil/dev-env/blob/master/osx-setup.sh
sbatir <notifications@github.com> schrieb am Mi. 29. März 2017 um 18:12:
…
 Hey @geoHeil <https://github.com/geoHeil> , could you show me what paths
 you've got? I'm getting the exact same error as you, but I also have cudnn
 downloaded and installed.
 dyn-160-39-142-202:lib sbatir$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcud*
 lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir admin 33 Mar 3 17:36
 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib -> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib
 -rwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 13504 Jan 11 20:31
 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 45 Jan 11 20:33
 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a ->
 /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudadevrt.a lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 50
 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib ->
 /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir
 wheel 46 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib ->
 /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir wheel 49
 Jan 11 20:33 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a ->
 /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a lrwxr-xr-x 1 sbatir admin
 36 Mar 3 17:37 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5 ->
 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib -rwxr-xr-x@ 1 sbatir admin 76280680
 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib -rwxr-xr-x@ 1 sbatir
 admin 76280680 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.dylib -rw-r--r--@
 1 sbatir admin 64702864 Feb 24 16:32 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn_static.a

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

at https://github.com/geoHeil/dev-env/blob/master/osx-setup.sh
